summary: Provides an abstract base class implementing shared functionality for attribute‑based solvers in Checkov's graph analysis. It parses JSONPath expressions, supports wildcard matching, detects Terraform variable dependencies, and evaluates attribute values across graph nodes, with optional parallel execution.
business_intent: To supply a common, extensible foundation that concrete attribute solvers can use to resolve and compare resource attributes efficiently when performing security and compliance checks on infrastructure‑as‑code configurations.
